data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: To mix/mingle/incorporate/blend, exasperate/irritate/enrage a person, to give something, contend or dispute with a person, various in disposition or temperament.
data.sentence: The word وَمِزَاجُهُ comes from the root م ز ج and is associated with the meanings: To mix/mingle/incorporate/blend, exasperate/irritate/enrage a person, to give something, contend or dispute with a person, various in disposition or temperament.

data.meanings: to raise/ascend, rise high. sanam - camel's hump, prominence, chief of a tribe. sanamatun - blossom, summit. tasnim - water (of life) coming from above signifying spirituality/knowledge from Allah.
data.sentence: The word تَسْنِيمٍ comes from the root س ن م and is associated with the meanings: to raise/ascend, rise high. sanam - camel's hump, prominence, chief of a tribe. sanamatun - blossom, summit. tasnim - water (of life) coming from above signifying spirituality/knowledge from Allah.
